Invited talk on "Early career research viewpoint on future vision for DEI in RSE" presented at the Lorentz Centre (hybrid) Workshop on "[Vive la différence - research software engineers](https://www.researchsoft.org/events/2022-04/)" organized by the "Research Software Alliance". It was an hybrid event with an in-person element from 19-22 April 2022 at the Lorentz Centre in the Netherlands; and online events from March-April 2022 across different time zones.
